Main Content Region



Jack H. Brown College (JHBC)










Explore Jack H. Brown College of Business & Public Administration Programs
















 
 







NEW Stater Bros. Markets Online BA Completion Program
The JHBC Stater Bros. Markets Online Bachelor of Arts in Administration Degree Completion Program, the first named degree program in the CSU system, provides residents and the workforce an opportunity to complete their business education in a flexible, fully online format.  

LEARN MORE 






 







JHBC Welcomes New Dean
Dr. Tomás Gómez-Arias joined the pack July 1 and is working to ensure the success of new programs and continue developing JHBC’s portfolio of offerings. He looks forward to meeting all stakeholders.

READ MORE  






 







Welcome Back Info & Resources
Welcome Back 'Yotes!

Virtual Learning Resources/Support
Stay Engaged


 







 







JHBC's School of Entrepreneurship 
JHBC’s School of Entrepreneurship is one of less than 15 worldwide! It has extended our globally accredited and recognized entrepreneurship program & elevated our impact on innovation.

LEARN MORE 






 







JHBC At A Glance
The Jack H. Brown College is a internationally recognized and accredited college with programs & experiences to help launch careers or advancements in business and public administration. 

JHBC AT A GLANCE 2022 UPDATE  






 







CSUSB Coyote Network
Take the new opportunity to stay connected with students and fellow alumni to promote growth and success. 

JOIN THE NETWORK

Online Degree Offerings




We're Highly Ranked!

#8 In the West & #44 of Best Graduate Entrepreneurship School l Princeton Review, 2023
#13 Best in Offering Information Technology Degrees l Best Accredited Colleges 2022
Tier 1 Global MBA Program/#44 MBA Online Program l CEO Magazine, 2022
Best Online MBA Program, Best Part-Time MBA Program l U.S. News & World Report, 2022 
#50 of Top Graduate Schools for Entrepreneurship Studies, Top On-Campus MBA Program in the Nation, #3 for Best MBA for Human Resources, #25 in Top 50 Online MBA Programs l The Princeton Review, 2022
Intelligent.com 2022
	
Best Online Certificate in Accounting Programs | Ranked 1 – Intelligent Pick
Best Online MBA Degree Programs (No GMAT Required) | Ranked 11 – Best in the West
Best Master’s in Public Administration Degree Programs | Ranked 17 – Best for Cybersecurity
Best Online Master of Public Administration Programs | Ranked 19 – Good Value
Most Affordable Online Master’s in Accounting Programs | Ranked 36 – Best Cohort Program


Top Grad School - Public Affairs (MPA) & MBA (Online/Part-time) l U.S. News & World Report, 2021 
Online MBA Program is #5 in CA, #9 in the West, #49 Nationwide l Online MBA Report, June 2021
#15 of 50 Best Online MBA Programs in US l College Consensus, Sept. 2019
Top 25 best value online MPA programs in US l Value Colleges, July 2019
See more CSUSB rankings!
